insight: ChatControl's Discord integration requires the DiscordSRV plugin. Users must disable DiscordSRV's built-in chat relay by setting `DiscordChatChannelMinecraftToDiscord: false` in DiscordSRV's `config.yml`, otherwise messages get duplicated. ChatControl checks this on startup and logs a warning if it's still enabled (see ChatControl.java line ~247).

When users report "bypass caps not working", the caps correction may be coming from another plugin rather than ChatControl. ChatControl's default anti-caps message is "Please avoid excessive capitalization in your {type}." (locale key `checker-caps` in `en_US.json`) and is sent as a chat message, not a title. If the user sees a different message (e.g., "Too many caps" as a title), another plugin is responsible. Ask users to confirm the exact message text and format to rule this out early.
